item.adrift.recall_potion_lore1: Consume to return to your spawn point.
item.adrift.recall_potion_lore2: Sneak to return to the monument if discovered.
rp_warn:
If this looks like White Glazed Terracotta, then you are missing this map's resource pack!

Punch the block for a link to the resource pack!
info.2:
Welcome to 24-Hour Miracle: Adrift, a CTM Map that was
built in 24 Hours on June 20, 2025! This event lasted 24 hours instead
of the usual three to make a more time-zone friendly event
and to create a better product!

This map is open world, 19 objectives, random loot,
custom recipes, enchantments, currency, and more!
rules.2:
1. Do not use in-game commands

2. Do not leave the map boundaries

3. Only place wools that are labeled as Objective Items

4. Do not modify the world's files

5. Do not play in peaceful difficulty
rp.info: Click %s to install the Adrift Resource Pack!
